means: 斜着地（的），侧目而视地（的）

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... asprawl 躺卧的 asquint 斜眼 ass 驴.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : perhaps from a- 'on' + a Low German or Dutch word related to modern Dutch schuinte 'slant'

means.word_mean: 1. (used especially of glances) directed to one side with or as if with doubt or suspicion or envy;

sentences.sentence: "her eyes with their misted askance look"- Elizabeth Bowen
